The tidyverse package `{ggplot2}` uses the 'grammar of graphics' to separate plots into seven components. Here we focus on mapping aesthetics, statistical tranformations, and facets.

## Learning objectives

* Apply properties across all geometric objects
* Map aesthetics to geometrics objects globally or locally
* Plot statistical summaries of data
* Make subplots of data with facets.
